import React from 'react'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); // 5.123 =>"5.12" => 5.12 return (

  • Shipping

    Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address:{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalcode} ,{cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method:{cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map((item) =>(
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • )) }
) }
